migrations.description: Update to Cypress v11. This migration will only update if the workspace is already on v10. https://www.cypress.io/blog/2022/11/04/upcoming-changes-to-component-testing/
migrations.name: update-to-cypress-11

migrations.description: Update to Cypress v12. Cypress 12 contains a handful of breaking changes that might causes tests to start failing that nx cannot directly fix. Read more Cypress 12 changes: https://docs.cypress.io/guides/references/migration-guide#Migrating-to-Cypress-12-0.This migration will only run if you are already using Cypress v11.
migrations.name: update-to-cypress-12

migrations.description: Replace @nx/cypress with @nx/cypress
migrations.name: update-16-0-0-add-nx-packages

migrations.description: Normalize tsconfig.cy.json files to be located at '<projectRoot>/cypress/tsconfig.json'
migrations.name: update-16-2-0-normalize-tsconfigs

migrations.description: Remove tsconfig.e2e.json and add settings to project tsconfig.json. tsConfigs executor option is now deprecated. The project level tsconfig.json file should be used instead.
migrations.name: update-16-3-0-remove-old-tsconfigs

migrations.description: Update to Cypress v13. Most noteable change is video recording is off by default. This migration will only update if the workspace is already on Cypress v12. https://docs.cypress.io/guides/references/migration-guide#Migrating-to-Cypress-130
migrations.name: update-16-8-0-cypress-13

migrations.description: Update to Cypress ^13.6.6 if the workspace is using Cypress v13 to ensure workspaces don't use v13.6.5 which has an issue when verifying Cypress.
migrations.name: update-cypress-version-13-6-6
